      • hasDefaultConfig

        public boolean hasDefaultConfig()
        Checks whether a default config path was specified, not if the file behind it actually exists
        Returns:
        True if a non-null default config path was specified, false otherwise

      • isDirty

        Whether there are changes that have to be written back to the file
